A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Meh. The story arc is disappointing\, disjointed\, underdeveloped\, OVERdeveloped\, not developed. Sure\, confound all of our expectations but at least replace it with something worthwhile\, compelling\, smile-inducing. If the goal was to tear down everything up to this point in the SW universe to replace it with some sanitized agenda driven drivel... success? Wow.

No better than a mediocre Star Wars Rebels episode\, I expect more from a Star Wars movie. Episode 1 made more sense and at least had an understandable story line! :-) Let's just say Rogue One was over the top amazingly great compared to VIII.

Many years ago after watching Phantom Menace in the theater I rushed home to immediately watch New Hope to see why I felt so disappointed about PM. Now\, years later\, after watching The Last Jedi\, I rushed home to watch Phantom Menace!

Not sure the "top critics" watched the same movie!

Chewy becomes a vegan! Yeah\, right!

Oh\, and yes\, I signed up for an account just so I could write this review\, that's how perturbed I was. :-) I am not a bot! :-) :-)
